node.title: Watch: Party People - Season 2 | Episode 1
node.description: Party People returns with a deep dive into the government's Delta response and Mihingarangi, Tau and Shane dip their toes into the Three Waters reform. Watch the first episode. Video
node.content: ["Rowdier than the debating chamber at question time, Party People places a M\u0101ori lens on politics, politicians and their parties and is fronted by award-winning journalist and presenter Mihingarangi Forbes, with former National MP Tau Henare and left-wing commentator Shane Te Pou.", "Watch the first episode:", "Originally launched as a pre-election podcast in 2020, you can watch series two of Party People broadcast live on RNZ National, streamed live on RNZ's Facebook and YouTube channels, or listen to the podcast.", "Party People will follow Checkpoint with Lisa Owen, at 6:30pm on Tuesdays. Each episode will subsequently air on Waatea Radio and T\u016branga FM.", "Produced for RNZ by Aotearoa Media Collective | Public Interest Journalism funded through NZ On Air"]
